place.name: BELVEDERE
place.gazetteerText: BELVIDERE, a station on the North Kent railway, 13 ¼. miles W of London Bridge. Belvidere House, in its vicinity, near the Thames, is the seat of Sir Culling Eardley, Bart.; and contains a choice collection of pictures. (In 1870-72, John Marius Wilson's Imperial Gazetteer of England and Wales)
